turns.ai_line: Doctor, I dey feel serious pain for my belle. I chop some leftover rice yesterday and since then, I no fit sleep because of the wahala for my stomach. I dey feel like vomit and my belly dey run too. E no normal at all. This kind thing no dey happen for my area because e dey very humid and food dey spoil quick quick. I dey really worried.

Doctor, I beg, which kind medicine I fit take to stop this pain? And how I fit prevent am make e no come back again? Because the way wey food dey spoil for we area, I no want make this kind thing happen again.
Doctor, you no talk anything. Abeg, I still dey wait for your advice. E dey important make I sabi wetin I fit do to stop this pain and how I fit prevent am for future.
